Updated November     pm



China is expected to overtake the United States economy before the year  according to a new intelligence assessment of global trend PERIOD However it is projected the U.S PERIOD will still be a global powerhouse because of its energy independence PERIOD

Additionally the assessment projected a larger global middle class that will be better educated have better access to health insurance for the future and more people with Internet access according to a New York Times report PERIOD

Still the report predicts terrorism will still be prevalent and half of the worlds population will be living in areas that will suffer from fresh water shortages PERIOD

Moreover the study found countries such as Brazil Colombia India Indonesia Nigeria South Africa and Turkey are going to be impactful on the worlds economy as well PERIOD
